title: Three Nights in Faral-Khazal: A Trio of Tales from the World of Euvael
description: What do a royal chef, an embalmer, and a career thief have in common? Three Nights in Faral-Khazal is a triptych of standalone (but interconnected) stories in the same high fantasy city. I. Chef Kaira fears she'll soon be feeding worms when she forgets an important dish for a diplomatic banquet. II. Tariki is an ambitious embalmer who will stop at nothing to contain the secret he's unleashed at a dinner party. III. Emelith the Finder runs into an ex-partner on her heist to steal an heirloom from the Hanging Graveyard of Faral-Khazal.
author: David M. Samuels
